So the best solution to monetize the app was to do new stuff for PRO users that makes the app even more useful, while keeping the basic features fully functional and accessible to all.

If you are a PRO, a payment of $10 is _nothing_. Auto refresh will save you that much time in just a single day. Spend a minute watching the video at https://iconfactory.com/worldwideweb/ and you’ll see why.

But your $10 also goes towards helping someone else coming up behind you. And I think that’s pretty cool.

As I pointed out the other day, there are a ton of folks using WorldWideWeb to improve their skills. The web has and always will be a great way to get your foot in the door of the tech industry. It’s a foundational skill that many careers are built on top of.

All of us PROs know how important the web is in our work. Heck, it’s one of the main reasons I wrote WorldWideWeb in the first place: recent versions of macOS don’t have a button you can push to start learning.

Wie man in den Niederlanden Zug, Bus, Tram oder sonstigen OV benutzt:

1. Durch die Sperre gehen. Dazu kann man ein beliebiges kontaktloses Zahlungsmittel verwenden, darunter Debit und Credit Card, oder halt ein Ticket.
2. Fahren
3. Durch die Sperre gehen. Dazu dasselbe Zahlungsmittel wieder an die Sperre halten, das beim Einsteigen verwendet worden ist.

title: Wikidata:Wikimedia Deutschland Hardware Donation Program - Wikidata

last_post.content: 🎉Exciting news🎉 #WikimediaDE is launching a laptop donation program to support #Wikidata contributors with limited access to technology. If you've been actively contributing to Wikidata for at least a year, you can request a free laptop to support your work. Apply here: https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Wikidata:Wikimedia_Deutschland_Hardware_Donation_Program

My ebooks and audiobooks (from Tor Books, Head of Zeus, McSweeneys, Beacon and others) are for sale all over the net, but I sell 'em too, and when you buy 'em from me, I earn twice as much and you get books with no DRM and no license "agreements."

https://craphound.com/shop/
